Module com.github.sormuras.bach

Package com.github.sormuras.bach

package com.github.sormuras.bach
Provides the classes and interfaces of ðŸŽ¼ Bach, the Java Shell Builder.

Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in any class or interface in this package will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Command<C>
     
    ModuleLookup
    A function that tries to link a module name to a specific uniform resource identifier.

    A builder for building module lookup objects linking an external module.

    Implementations of ModuleLookup for various libraries.
    ModuleLookups.GitHubReleases
    Find modular JAR files attached to a GitHub Release.
    ModuleLookups.JavaFX
    Maps well-known JavaFX module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    ModuleLookups.JUnitJupiter
    Maps well-known JUnit Jupiter module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    ModuleLookups.JUnitPlatform
    Maps well-known JUnit Platform module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    ModuleLookups.LWJGL
    Maps well-known LWJGL module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
